text: hydraulic hammer attachment. Kobelco Construction Machinery America, LLC. is a manufacturer of excavators based in Houston, Texas, United States, with a manufacturing plant in Moore, South Carolina and is subsidiary of Kobe Steel. A former global sales alliance between Kobe Steel and CNH Global ended in December 2012. ==References== ==External links== * http://kobelco-usa.com/ Category:Construction equipment manufacturers of the United States Category:Manufacturing companies based in Houston
title: Kobelco Construction Machinery America
